creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Theodore W. Bennett

markings: On verso (stretcher) in blue pencil: [Metzinger Sept. 1921]
provenance:
Galerie l'Effort Moderne, Paris, France.[1] Mr. and Mrs. Theodore Bennett, Wayzata, Minnesota; gift to MIA in 1974.

[1] The Galerie l'Effort Moderne was run by Léonce Rosenberg. Several works by Metzinger passed through this gallery, and its ownership is confirmed by a label on the verso of the work.
title: Still Life
